mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TASK_RECEIVE_EMP_MES ( ID, INSIDE_ORDER, PROD_NO, CRAFWORK_ID, DO_EMP_NO, ACT_DATE, PLAN_DATE, ACT_HOURS, AMOUNT, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY, COMPANY_ID, DELETED, PRICE ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{insideOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crafworkId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{doEmpNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{planDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{actHours,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_TASK_RECEIVE_EMP_MES.nextval as id FROM dual
mapper.update:
UPDATE TASK_RECEIVE_EMP_MES
INSIDE_ORDER = #{insideOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROD_NO = #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRAFWORK_ID = #{crafworkId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
DO_EMP_NO = #{doEmpNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACT_DATE = #{actDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PLAN_DATE = #{planDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ACT_HOURS = #{actHours,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.sql: SELECT ID id, INSIDE_ORDER insideOrder, PROD_NO prodNo, CRAFWORK_ID crafworkId, DO_EMP_NO doEmpNo, ACT_DATE actDate, PLAN_DATE planDate, ACT_HOURS actHours, AMOUNT amount, STATUS status, CREATE_TIME createTime, CREATE_BY createBy, MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, MODIFY_BY modifyBy, COMPANY_ID companyId, DELETED deleted, PRICE price
